This is , finally, what i need.  By far the best version of Win8 with best activator . Works absolutely perfectly, smooth, no error, no troubles. You have one thing to keep in mind (write it on a piece of paper with big characters :))))   close/disable  ANY internet connection you have before install. Proceed with  iShark0 steps and you're done . You don't even need to burn any DVD . It works directly from HDD . Extract the files from ISO in a folder , hit setup.exe then install without any bother. ( but , i repeat, don't forget to close any internet connection you might have, better cut out the cable  to be sure :)))  Thanks iShark0
